title: How to add an app to my Samsung Smart TV that is not pre-installed - Quora

response.answer_text: Press the menu button to display the row of apps at the bottom of the screen, scroll over until you see “Apps” and then click on that, then when that opens in full, up at the top is the search line and you can search for the app and install it if it is available, which if it is, will show in the results of the search, or you can look thru the apps that display in this window. At least on my Samsung 55″ Curve TV is how its done.
